description: A schema for defining a physics exam with various question types. This version uses arrays for lists of items and avoids complex types.

exam_title.description: The official title of the exam.

tags.description: The tags associated with the exam.

questions.description: An array containing all the questions and problems for the exam.

id.description: A unique identifier for the question (e.g., 'q1', 'p2').

type.description: The category of the question, which determines its structure.

prompt.description: The main text of the question being asked.

figure.description: An optional figure or diagram accompanying the question.

description.description: A textual description of the figure's contents.

filename.description: The filename of the image for the figure.

render.description: Contains code to render a diagram.

content.description: The code to render the diagram.

tasks.description: A list of specific tasks or values to calculate for a numerical problem.

options.description: An array of key-value pairs for multiple-choice options.

answer.description: Contains the final answer and the detailed solution.

solution.description: The concise, final answer. If multiple-choice question, should be the exact id of the right option.

explanation.description: A step-by-step explanation, derivation, or justification for the final answer.
